description: Stores payment details for each order, including payment method, installments, and the amount paid.
Contains order information, such as customer ID, order status, timestamps related to purchase, approval, and delivery.
Holds information about products, including category, weight, dimensions, and the number of photos available.
Records each item within an order, including product ID, seller ID, price, freight value, and shipping limit date.
Includes information about customers, such as their unique ID, location (zip code, city, state), and associated order data.
Contains customer reviews for orders, including review score, comment, and timestamps for review creation and response.
Stores details about sellers, including their ID, location (zip code prefix, city, state), and associated products sold.
Holds geographic data, including latitude and longitude, for different zip code prefixes and cities.
Contains data on qualified leads, with information on the first contact date, landing page ID, and origin of the lead.
Tracks closed leads with details on business segment, lead type, company attributes, and revenue.
Provides translations for product category names, mapping each category to its English equivalent.
